summary: Completed comprehensive testing of The Fork app - React SPA + FastAPI backend for chatting with alter ego. All core features working perfectly including fork setup, chat functionality, intensity levels, typing indicators, reset flow, and safety filtering.
passed_tests: Fork setup with prompt input and intensity toggle
Open the Other Door button disabled until text entered
Setup collapse into sticky fork summary bar after start
Chat send: Enter sends message, Shift+Enter creates newline
Message bubbles with avatars (You vs Other You)
Reset flow: modal confirmation, cancel/confirm functionality
Backend /api/chat endpoint returns realistic alter ego responses
Safety filtering: self-harm content triggers grounding response
LLM integration via emergentintegrations working correctly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (9/9 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all features working)
